title: Keeping A Secret Always Backfires
itunes:title: Keeping A Secret Always Backfires
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m in my late twenties and I got married 2 years ago. My husband is 11 years older than I am and he’s a great man, but he went through a brief period of ED before we got married. I was young and carefree at that time so I did something very stupid. I had gone for close to 3 months without sex with my man and I went to a wedding back in my hometown and had sex with my ex-boyfriend from high school...................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m in my late twenties and I got married 2 years ago. My husband is 11 years older than I am and he’s a great man, but he went through a brief period of ED before we got married. I was young and carefree at that time so I did something very stupid. I had gone for close to 3 months without sex with my man and I went to a wedding back in my hometown and had sex with my ex-boyfriend from high school...................................
